channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Quotes llama
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Quotes llama

item.title: CVE-2022-1566|2024-08-03T00:10:03.472Z -- unknown -- quotes%20llama
item.description: The Quotes llama WordPress plugin before 1.0.0 does not sanitise and escape Quotes, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed. The attack could also be performed by tricking an admin to import a malicious CSV file
